co.cask.tigon.logging
Interface LoggingContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLoggingContext, FlowletLoggingContext
public interface LoggingContext

Defines LoggingContext interface so that we have at least somewhat structured logging context data and know how to inject it on the logs writing end.

Nested Class Summary
static interface LoggingContext.SystemTag
          Defines the interface for the system tag associated with LoggingContext.
 
Method Summary
 String getLogPartition()
          Returns the partition name that is used to group log messages of a component into one partition for collection.
 String getLogPathFragment()
          Returns the path fragment that will be part of the log file name.
 Collection<LoggingContext.SystemTag> getSystemTags()
           
 Map<String,LoggingContext.SystemTag> getSystemTagsMap()
           
 

Method Detail

getSystemTags

Collection<LoggingContext.SystemTag> getSystemTags()
Returns:
collection of system tags associated with this logging context

getSystemTagsMap

Map<String,LoggingContext.SystemTag> getSystemTagsMap()
Returns:
Map of tag name to system tag associated with this logging context

getLogPartition

String getLogPartition()
Returns the partition name that is used to group log messages of a component into one partition for collection. The partition name must be consistent with the value returned as path fragment.

Returns:
partition name.

getLogPathFragment

String getLogPathFragment()
Returns the path fragment that will be part of the log file name. The grouping of log messages into partitions should be consistent with the value returned as path fragment.

Returns:
the path fragment that will be part of the log file name.
